text: Ablaberoides tardus are a species of beetles first discovered by Louis Albert Péringuey in 1904. No subspecies are listed in the Catalogue of Life. ==References== Péringuey L. (1904) Descriptive catalogue of the Coleoptera of South Africa, Transactions of the South African philosophical Society. Cape Town 13:1-293 Scarabs: World Scarabaeidae Database. Schoolmeesters P., 2011-05-30 Category:Melolonthinae
title: Ablaberoides tardus
